description: This file contains integration tests for the CerebrasOpenAI model within the agno project, testing various functionalities such as basic response, streaming, asynchronous calls, memory handling, and structured output.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model used for testing structured output responses, representing a movie script with title, genre, and plot.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: A helper function to verify that the response metrics contain positive token counts and that total tokens equal the sum of input and output tokens.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests a basic synchronous call to the CerebrasOpenAI model and verifies the response content, message roles, and metrics.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming responses from the model, verifying iterator behavior and response content.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Asynchronous test for a basic call to the model, verifying response content and metrics.

methods.name: test_async_basic_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous test for streaming responses, verifying that responses are received and contain content.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests the agent's memory capabilities by maintaining context across multiple interactions and verifying stored messages.

methods.name: test_structured_output
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to produce structured output conforming to a Pydantic model.
